text: Mary Wibberley ( â€“ 29 December 2013) was an English romantic fiction writer. She wrote over 48 romance novels. Her first novel, Black Niall, was published in 1973. Wibberley died after a short illness on 29 December 2013. She was aged 79. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2013 deaths Category:English writers
title: Mary Wibberley
